name: Calcu-late (itch)
description:
Calcu-Late is a game about a boy named James that need to participate in a godly Olympics tournament as a representative for the goddess of mathematics, Seshat. The tournament will grant the participant a wish they stated before the tournament starts. James is gonna take a final exam of math in his school, yet he forgot to study for it. His wish is just to pass the math finals.

The game is written in English and will consist of several puzzle and Versus-AI games.
